params._tokenId: Token ID of the item being auctioned

createAuction(address,uint256,uint256,ui.details: Only the owner of this NFT can list the item

params._duration: How long the auction takes to end
params._tokenId: Token ID of the item being auctioned

endAuction(address,uint256).details: This function can only be caller by the seller address.It is better to make an automation to call this function once the real time reaches ending time of the      auction using oracle networks like ChainLink, but we kept it simple by making it called by the seller.

params._tokenId: Token ID of the item being auctioned

getAuction(address,uint256).details: if there is no listed auction of this nftAddress and tokenId, all returned value will be the default

params._tokenId: token of the listed item in the auction

bid(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Add new bid in the given auction

createAuction(address,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Create new auction for a given NFT item

endAuction(address,uint256).notice: End the auction and transfer item to the highest bidder if existed, and send money to the seller.

getAuction(address,uint256).notice: Getting all information about a given auction by giving `nftAddress` and `tokenId`
